meanings.definition: A person who holds absurd beliefs or behaves in an absurd manner.
meanings.sent1: The absurdest in the group always made everyone laugh with their strange ideas.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the absurdest in town for her outlandish theories.
meanings.sent3: The absurdest at the party wore a hat made of cheese, causing giggles all around.
meanings.sent4: His actions were so absurdest that they seemed like scenes from a comedy show.
meanings.sent5: The absurdest's antics were so bizarre that they became the talk of the town.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to absurdity or the absurd.
meanings.sent1: The play had an absurdest plot that left the audience puzzled.
meanings.sent2: Her absurdest sense of humor always brought smiles to people's faces.
meanings.sent3: The absurdest painting in the gallery featured a flying pig wearing a top hat.
meanings.sent4: The situation was so absurdest that it felt like a dream.
meanings.sent5: His absurdest jokes never failed to lighten the mood in the room.

meanings.sent1: In the world of comedy, he was considered the absurdest of them all.
meanings.sent2: The absurdest of all decisions led to unexpected outcomes.
meanings.sent3: The absurdest of hats at the party was a giant sombrero with disco lights.
meanings.sent4: His choice of words was the absurdest in the entire conversation.
meanings.sent5: The absurdest of all moments was when the cat started dancing on its hind legs.
